column1: # Добавить сюда своих вопросов. Эту строку надо пропустить при настройке CsvToBean (withSkipLines)
How often should you feed a cat?
column2: Twice a day%false|Food should always be in the bowl%true|When it asks%false

column1: Does a cat need its own house or bed?
column2: Yes, it's her sanctuary%true|The whole apartment is her space. The house is unnecessary%false|No, she'll sleep on the couch or the radiator%false

column1: What kind of food is better to give a cat?
column2: Dry food only%false|Cooked meat%false|Wet and dry food%true

column1: Why do cats dig in their litter?
column2: Doesn't like the smell%false|Because of the instinct for self-preservation%true|Out of boredom%false

column1: What taste can cats not perceive?
